name: assignment
description: - Write code to perform the following tasks:     - Create a new Solana account with a balance of some SOL.     - Transfer 0.1 SOL from the newly created account to `63EEC9FfGyksm7PkVC6z8uAmqozbQcTzbkWJNsgqjkFs` account.     - Close the newly created account. - All of the above steps must be completed in a single transaction. - Please include the signatures of your executed transactions run on devnet in your submission.
